00007 #include "arm/arm_control.h"
00008 #include <cstdio>

00020 void ArmControl::init()
00021 {
00022         shutdown_ = false;
00023 
00024         // Initialize subscribers and clients
00025     cartesian_sub_ = n_.subscribe("cartesian_moves", 1000,
00026                                   &ArmControl::cartesianMovesCallback, this);
00027     constant_sub_ = n_.subscribe("constant_moves", 1,
00028                                  &ArmControl::constantMoveCallback, this);
00029     constant_time_sub_ = n_.subscribe("constant_move_times", 1,
00030                                       &ArmControl::constantMoveTimeCallback,
00031                                       this);
00032     time_client_ = n_.serviceClient<time_server::time_srv>("time_service");
00033 
00034     // Initialize the ARM
00035     arm_ = ManusArm::instance();
00036     try
00037     {
00038         arm_->init("can0");
00039     }
00040     catch (ArmException& e)
00041     {
00042         printf("%s\n", e.what());
00043         ROS_FATAL("Arm initialization failed");
00044         return;
00045     }
00046 
00047         // Move arm into origin position
00048     for (int i = 0; i < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00049     {
00050         cartesian_move_.positions[i] = ORIGIN_POSITION[i];
00051         cartesian_move_.speeds[i] = 2;
00052     }
00053     arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00054     arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00055 
00056     // Main loop
00057         while (ros::ok() && !shutdown_)
00058         {
00059                 ros::spinOnce();
00060         }
00061 
00062         // Move arm into final position only if ROS is still ok
00063         if (ros::ok())
00064         {
00065                 for (int i = 0; i < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00066                 {
00067                         cartesian_move_.positions[i] = FINAL_POSITION[1][i];
00068                         cartesian_move_.speeds[i] = 2;
00069                 }
00070                 arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00071                 arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00072 
00073                 while (!arm_->isMoveComplete())
00074                 {
00075                         //printf("Not Complete\n");
00076                         ros::Duration(0.06).sleep();
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00080         printf("Arm control shutdown\n");
00081 }
00082 
00086 void ArmControl::cartesianMovesCallback(const arm::cartesian_moves::ConstPtr&
00087                                         cmd)
00088 {
00089         time_server::time_srv end_check;
00090     end_check.request.target = cmd->end;
00091 
00092     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cmd->moves.size(); i++)
00093     {
00094         if (time_client_.call(end_check))
00095         {
00096             printf("CAT end time : %f\n", end_check.request.target.toSec());
00097             printf("CA run time  : %f\n", cmd->moves[i].header.stamp.toSec());
00098             printf("Server time  : %f\n", end_check.response.actual.toSec());
00099             printf("Delta        : %f\n", end_check.response.delta.toSec());
00100 
00101             // Check for a current move and stop if necessary
00102             if (!arm_->isMoveComplete()) arm_->setMoveComplete(true);
00103 
00104             if (end_check.response.delta > ros::Duration(-0.2))
00105             {
00106                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; j++)
00107                 {
00108                     cartesian_move_.positions[j] = cmd->moves[i].positions[j];
00109                     cartesian_move_.speeds[j] = cmd->moves[i].speeds[j];
00110                 }
00111                 arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00112                 arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00113             }
00114             else
00115             {
00116                 ROS_INFO("Out of time, movement sequence over!");
00117                 return;
00118             }
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122             ROS_ERROR("Time server is not responding");
00123             return;
00124         }
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00131 void ArmControl::constantMoveCallback(const arm::constant_move::ConstPtr& cmd)
00132 {
00133         if (cmd->quit)
00134         {
00135                 shutdown_ = true;
00136         }
00137         else if (cmd->query)
00138     {
00139         print();
00140     }
00141     else
00142     {
00143         for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00144                 constant_move_.states[i] = static_cast<int>(cmd->states[i]);
00145         for (int i = 0; i < SPD_ARR_SZ; i++)
00146                 constant_move_.speeds[i] = static_cast<int>(cmd->speeds[i]);
00147         arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00154 void ArmControl::constantMoveTimeCallback(const arm::constant_move_time::ConstPtr &cmd)
00155 {
00156     time_server::time_srv end_check;
00157     end_check.request.target = cmd->end;
00158 
00159     if (time_client_.call(end_check))
00160     {
00161         if (end_check.response.delta > ros::Duration(0))
00162         {
00163             ROS_INFO("Moving...");
00164 
00165             printf("Move start time  : %f\n", cmd->header.stamp.toSec());
00166             printf("Server time      : %f\n", end_check.response.actual.toSec());
00167             printf("Delta            : %f\n", (cmd->header.stamp -
00168                     end_check.response.actual).toSec());
00169             printf("Duration of move : %f\n", end_check.response.delta.toSec());
00170 
00171             for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00172             {
00173                 constant_move_.states[i] = cmd->move.states[i];
00174                 if (i < SPD_ARR_SZ)
00175                         constant_move_.speeds[i] = cmd->move.speeds[i];
00176             }
00177             arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00178 
00179             end_check.response.delta.sleep();
00180 
00181             // Stop
00182             for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00183                                 constant_move_.states[i] = 0;
00184             arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00185         }
00186         else
00187             ROS_ERROR("This movement would have started after its ending time");
00188     }
00189     else
00190         ROS_ERROR("Time server is not responding, movement command skipped");
00191 }
00192 
00196 void ArmControl::print()
00197 {
00198         printf("\n%s", arm_->getPrintState().c_str());
00199 }

00201 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00202 {
00203     ros::init(argc, argv, "arm_control");
00204     ArmControl arm_control;
00205     return 0;
